price: ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߛߏ߬ߙߌ߬ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߛߍ߬ߣߍ ߡߊ߬ ߔߌߟߌ߲ߔߌߟߌ߲߫ ߣߴߊߟߎ߫ ߞߍ߫ ߘߴߊ߬ ߕߍ߰ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
